56504.en: <voice 00190_00056504><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>Ma-den. Is it possible to forget the<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56504.ja:
<voice 00190_00056504><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>「………まで……………んだ。
　………が………忘れられないのか。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56504.ko:
<voice 00190_00056504><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>: ………까지 ……………야.
　………를……… 잊지 못한 거냐?<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56504.zh-Hans:
<voice 00190_00056504><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>……到……为止。
……无法忘记……吗？<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56504.zh-Hant:
<voice 00190_00056504><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>……到…………為止。
……是……忘不了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56505.en:
<voice 00250_00056505><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>I am the one who killed I'm the one
who killed<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56505.ja: <voice 00250_00056505><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>「……だ。……を殺したのは　私だ。<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56505.ko: <voice 00250_00056505><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>: ……다. ……를 죽인 건 나다.<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56505.zh-Hans: <voice 00250_00056505><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>……我。是……我杀死的。<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56505.zh-Hant: <voice 00250_00056505><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>……是我……殺了她的人，是我。<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56506.en:
<voice 00290_00056506><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>I guess so. That's why you changed
your name.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56506.ja:
<voice 00290_00056506><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>「…………だな。だから　名前……
　変えたのも…………か。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56506.ko:
<voice 00290_00056506><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>: …………군. 그래서 이름……
　바꾼 것도…………인가.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56506.zh-Hans:
<voice 00290_00056506><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>……是啊。所以名字……
改成了……吗？<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56506.zh-Hant:
<voice 00290_00056506><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>……是啊，所以換了名字……
也是為了……<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56507.en:
<voice 00375_00056507><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>I will not meet with I will be a great
priest to.<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56507.ja:
<voice 00375_00056507><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>「…………とは　……会わない。
　私は……………に　………大神官になる。<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56507.ko:
<voice 00375_00056507><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>: …………와는…… 만나지 않겠어.
　난……………에게 ………대신관이 될 거다.<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56507.zh-Hans:
<voice 00375_00056507><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>……不会和……见面。
我……成为大神官。<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56507.zh-Hant:
<voice 00375_00056507><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>……我不會跟……見面。
我……要……成為大神官了。<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56508.en: <voice 00105_00056508><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>Dear Grand PRIEST!<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56508.ja: <voice 00105_00056508><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「大神官さま！！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56508.zh-Hans: <voice 00105_00056508><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>大神官阁下？！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56508.zh-Hant: <voice 00105_00056508><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>大神官大人！！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56509.en:
<voice 00145_00056509><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>What's going on, Juaro? It's not nice
to shout inside the temple.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56509.ja:
<voice 00145_00056509><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「なにごとじゃ　ジュアロ。
　神殿内で　大声を張り上げるのは　感心せぬぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56509.ko:
<voice 00145_00056509><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 무슨 일인가, 주알로.
　신전에서 큰 소리를 내다니
　조심하지 못하겠나.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56509.zh-Hans:
<voice 00145_00056509><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>出什么事了，玖艾洛。
在神殿内不要大声喧哗。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56509.zh-Hant:
<voice 00145_00056509><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>什麼事，玖艾洛？
神殿內不可大聲喧嘩。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56510.en:
<voice 00345_00056510><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>I apologize for the inconvenience.
Actually, I have something to report
about Priest Zodera.<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56510.ja:
<voice 00345_00056510><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「……失礼いたしました。
　じつは　神官ゾデラのことで
　ご報告したいことが　あるのです。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56510.ko:
<voice 00345_00056510><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>: ……실례했습니다.
　실은 신관 조데라와 관련해
　보고드릴 게 있습니다.<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56510.zh-Hans:
<voice 00345_00056510><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>……失礼了。
其实我想向您报告一件事，
是关于佐提拉神官的。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56510.zh-Hant:
<voice 00345_00056510><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>……失禮了。
關於佐提拉神官，
我有事想向您稟報。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56511.en:
<voice 00385_00056511><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>I see. This traveler has come on your
business, has he not?<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56511.ja:
<voice 00385_00056511><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「なるほどのう……。
　この旅の者も　そなたの用で来たのじゃな。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56511.ko:
<voice 00385_00056511><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 그래…….
　이 여행자도 그대의 보고 때문에 온 게로군.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56511.zh-Hans:
<voice 00385_00056511><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>原来如此……
这个旅行者也是你派来的吧。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56511.zh-Hant:
<voice 00385_00056511><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……原來如此，
看來這位旅人和你來的理由是一樣的。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56512.en:
I have been wondering about the identity of Zodera for some time, and have now asked the traveler to look
into it for me.
56512.ja:
<voice 00425_00056512><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「かねてより　私はゾデラの素性が
　気にかかっておりましたが　こたび
　その旅人に頼み　調べてもらいました。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56512.ko:
<voice 00425_00056512><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>: 개인적으로 내내 조데라의 신상이
　마음에 걸렸던 터라 이번 기회에
　이 여행자에게 부탁해 알아보았습니다.<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56512.zh-Hans:
<voice 00425_00056512><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>以前我就觉得佐提拉的来历很可疑，
此次我委托这位旅行者进行了调查。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56512.zh-Hant:
<voice 00425_00056512><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>我從之前就很在意
佐提拉到底是什麼人，
於是委託了這位旅人幫忙調查。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56513.en:
<voice 00455_00056513><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>As a result, Zodera was suspected of
having apologized to people in the
past!<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56513.ja:
<voice 00455_00056513><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「その結果　ゾデラは　過去に人を
　あやめた疑いがあると　わかったのです！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56513.ko:
<voice 00455_00056513><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>: 그 결과, 조데라가 과거에 사람을
　죽였을지도 모른다는 사실을 알아냈습니다!<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56513.zh-Hans:
<voice 00455_00056513><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>结果发现了佐提拉以前
可能杀过人！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56513.zh-Hant:
<voice 00455_00056513><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>沒想到佐提拉
似乎曾經殺過人！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56514.en: <voice 00495_00056514><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>Zodera will make a person.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56514.ja: <voice 00495_00056514><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「ゾデラが　人を……のう。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56514.ko: <voice 00495_00056514><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 조데라가 사람을…… 말인가?<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56514.zh-Hans: <voice 00495_00056514><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>佐提拉杀过……啊。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56514.zh-Hant: <voice 00495_00056514><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>你說佐提拉他殺人……？<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56515.en:
<voice 00535_00056515><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>There is no hard evidence yet. But we
should call him right now and ask him
if this is true or false!<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56515.ja:
<voice 00535_00056515><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「確たる証拠は　まだ　ありません。
　ですが　今すぐに　彼を呼び
　ことの真偽を問いただすべきです！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56515.ko:
<voice 00535_00056515><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>: 아직 확실한 증거는 없습니다.
　하지만 지금 당장 조데라를 불러
　이 문제의 진위를 확인해야 합니다!<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56515.zh-Hans:
<voice 00535_00056515><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>我还没有确凿的证据。
但是我认为应该马上把他叫来，
问清楚事实真相！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56515.zh-Hant:
<voice 00535_00056515><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>我還沒有證據。
不過我們現在應該傳喚他過來，
詢問事情的真相如何才是！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56517.en:
Juaro. I am very pleased to hear from you. But I will take care of this matter. You are not to pursue Zodera
or speak to anyone else.
56517.ja:
<voice 00605_00056517><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「……ジュアロよ。よく報告してくれた。
　だが　この件は　わしが　あずかる。
　ゾデラへの追及も　他言も無用じゃ。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56517.ko:
<voice 00605_00056517><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: ……주알로, 보고해 주어 고맙네. 하지만
　이 문제는 내가 처리하기로 하지. 조데라의
　추궁도, 다른 이들에게 알릴 필요도 없네.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56517.zh-Hans:
<voice 00605_00056517><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……玖艾洛啊。谢谢你向我报告。
但是这件事就交给我处理。
你不要再调查佐提拉，也不要向别人提起此事。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56517.zh-Hant:
<voice 00605_00056517><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……玖艾洛啊，你做得很好。
不過這件事先緩一緩，
其他人也不可去質問佐提拉。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56518.en:
<voice 00645_00056518><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>But then! Are you saying that it's
okay to make a man who molests others
the Great Priest of Dharma?<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56518.ja:
<voice 00645_00056518><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「しかし　それでは……！
　人をあやめるような者を　ダーマの大神官に
　してもよいと　おっしゃるのですか！？<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56518.ko:
<voice 00645_00056518><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그래서는……!
　살인자일지도 모르는 사람을 다마 대신관
　자리에 앉혀도 상관없단 말씀이십니까!?<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56518.zh-Hans:
<voice 00645_00056518><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>但是，那样的话……
您的意思是可以让杀人犯来当
达玛的大神官吗？！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56518.zh-Hant:
<voice 00645_00056518><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>可是……！
您的意思是，
殺人犯也可以當達瑪的大神官嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56519.en:
<voice 00675_00056519><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>If that happens, the future of
Alltrades Abbey will be closed!<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56519.ja:
<voice 00675_00056519><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「そんなことになれば　このダーマ神殿の未来は
　閉ざされてしまいます！！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56519.ko:
<voice 00675_00056519><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>: 그랬다간 이 다마 신전의 명예가
　실추될 겁니다!!<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56519.zh-Hans:
<voice 00675_00056519><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>如果那样的话，这个达玛神殿
就没有未来了！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56519.zh-Hant:
<voice 00675_00056519><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>要是這樣的話，
達瑪神殿就沒有未來了！！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56520.en:
<voice 00715_00056520><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>Don't make me say it again. Back off,
Juaro.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56520.ja:
<voice 00715_00056520><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「何度も　言わすでない。
　下がるがよい　ジュアロ。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56520.ko:
<voice 00715_00056520><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 두 번 말하게 하지 말게.
　그만 물러가게나, 주알로.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56520.zh-Hans:
<voice 00715_00056520><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>别再让我重复了。
你退下吧，玖艾洛。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56520.zh-Hant:
<voice 00715_00056520><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>別讓我說第二次。
退下，玖艾洛。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56521.en: <voice 00795_00056521><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>Yes, I am. Excuse me.<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56521.ja: <voice 00795_00056521><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「……はい。失礼いたします。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56521.zh-Hans: <voice 00795_00056521><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>……是。我先失陪了。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56521.zh-Hant: <voice 00795_00056521><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>……是，我先失陪了。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56522.en:
<voice 00982_00056522><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>Oh. I owe you a thank you. Come by my
place later.<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56522.ja:
<voice 00982_00056522><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「ああ……。お前には　礼をしなければな。
　後で　私の所まで来てくれ。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56522.ko:
<voice 00982_00056522><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>: 아……. 네게 답례를 해야겠군.
　나중에 날 찾아오도록.<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56522.zh-Hans:
<voice 00982_00056522><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>啊……我得谢谢你。
过一会儿到我那里去。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56522.zh-Hant:
<voice 00982_00056522><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>對了……我得向你道謝，
等等來我這裡吧。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56523.en:
<voice 01126_00056523><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>Don't worry about Zodera. You, too,
are asked to keep this to yourselves.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56523.ja:
<voice 01126_00056523><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「ゾデラのことは　心配せずともよい。
　そなたも　このことは　他言無用に頼むぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56523.ko:
<voice 01126_00056523><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 조데라 문제는 걱정할 필요 없네.
　그대도 이 일은 함구하도록.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56523.zh-Hans:
<voice 01126_00056523><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>你不用担心佐提拉。
这件事请你也不要对他人提起。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56523.zh-Hant:
<voice 01126_00056523><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>佐提拉的事你不必擔心，
你也別向旁人提起這件事。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
